name: HyperBowl Forest
description:
Enjoy rolling through the idyllic forest of the third original HyperBowl lane, but don't take it too easy - you have to jump the stream to reach the pins!

Swipe the screen to push the bowling ball forward, left, right, even backward. Pinch to pause.

If you enjoy this lane, check out the full HyperBowl app for all the original and new lanes!

Built with the original HyperBowl art and sound assets licensed from Absolute Certainty Inc., the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, MacXWare Font Library, Lean Localization from Carlos Wilkes, and the iTween library from pixelplacement.

Join us on Facebook at http://hyperbowl.rocks/

HyperBowl is a trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc..
